properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 4:27AM EST until January 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect from 4 PM this afternoon
to 1 PM EST Wednesday. The Gale Watch is no longer in effect.

* WINDS...West 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 30 knots this
afternoon. Winds veer out of the northwest this evening with
occasional gales of 35 knots are possible. Winds subside to 10
to 20 knots Wednesday.

* WAVES...4 to 7 feet this afternoon, occasionally to 9 feet.
Waves 8 to 12 feet, occasionally to 15 feet tonight before
subsiding to 3 to 6 feet midday Wednesday.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY
